elements.name: Make a search through Live Departure Board

steps.name: I am not logged into the system
I am on the Live Train Times screen
I search for live time trains with the following criteria:
I should see the "Live Train Times Search Results" screen
the "Arrivals" label is shown
the "Search Results" list is not empty
I select item No.3 from the "Search Results" table
I should see the "Live Progress" screen
all "Platform Column" list items contain the "Platform" text

elements.name: Check earlier trains for a journey search in future
elements.description:
Acceptance criteria: I have searched for a single journey from London to Manchester
 I can see out journey results
 I tap earlier trains on out journey results screen
 Now I see new results on out journey results screen

steps.name: I am not logged into the system
I am on the Home page
I click on the "Buy Tickets" button
search for journey using the following criteria:
I should see the "Out Search Results" screen
I note the current page content as "Original Search Results"
I click on the "Earlier Trains" button
I should see the current page content is different from "Original Search Results"

elements.name: Check later trains for a journey search in future

search for journey using the following criteria:

elements.name: User selects a first class ticket
elements.description:
Acceptance criteria: I have searched for a single journey from London to Manchester
I can see out journey results
I select a journey
Now I check for first class tickets for the journey on ticket options screen

steps.name: I am not logged into the system
I am on the Home page
I click on the "Buy Tickets" button
search for journey using the following criteria:
I should see the "Out Search Results" screen
I select item No.1 from the "Search Results" table
I should see the "Select Ticket" screen
I click on the "First Class" button
I scroll to the "Anytime" text
click on the "Anytime" text
I should see the "Payment" screen
I am not logged into the system

result.error_message:
java.lang.AssertionError
	at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:86)
	at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:41)
	at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:52)
	at com.thetrainline.common.steps.OnCurrentPageGenericStep.I_should_see_the_message_is_shown(OnCurrentPageGenericStep.java:134)
	at âœ½.Then I should see the "The return journey start date must be after the outbound journey start date" message is shown(journeysearch/BasicJourneySearch.feature:96)

steps.name: I should see the "The return journey start date must be after the outbound journey start date" message is shown

arguments.val: The return journey start date must be after the outbound journey start date

comments.value: #      | ZFD    | YRK         |     | single      | +6 months |             | 1      | 1        | Date is outside range of data                      |
#      |        |             |     | single      | today     |             | 1      | 1        | You must choose origin and destination                                      |
#      | ZFD    |             |     | single      | today     |             | 1      | 1        | You must choose a destination station                                       |
#      |        | ZFD         |     | single      | today     |             | 1      | 1        | You must choose an origin station                                           |
#      | ZFD    | YRK         |     | return      | today     | today       | 1      | 1        | The return journey start date must be after the outbound journey start date |
#      | ZFD    | YRK         |     | return      | tomorrow  | today       | 1      | 1        | The return journey start date must be after the outbound journey start date |
